Flagstaff.KBXZ: KBXZ is a sports talk radio station broadcasting on 1650 AM. Serving Flagstaff, Arizona, the station carries programming from the Premiere Radio Networks as the local affiliate for Fox Sports Radio. KBXZ, known on-air as "Fox Sports Radio 1650" is also an affiliate of the Arizona State Radio Network, which carries sports programming from Arizona State University. Fox Sports Radio 1650 simulcasts on Suddenlink Cable TV Channel 99 in the Flagstaff area.
